hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.separationneed.report.SeparationNeedSummary( separationNeed.id, secondPerson.id, firstPerson.id, (select concat(bp.bed.room.facility.name, ' ', bp.bed.room.unit.name) from omis.bedplacement.domain.BedPlacement bp where bp.offender = secondPerson and bp.confirmed = true and (bp.dateRange.startDate < :date and (bp.dateRange.endDate is null or bp.dateRange.endDate > :date))), (select concat(bp.bed.room.facility.name, ' ', bp.bed.room.unit.name) from omis.bedplacement.domain.BedPlacement bp where bp.offender = firstPerson and bp.confirmed = true and (bp.dateRange.startDate < :date and (bp.dateRange.endDate is null or bp.dateRange.endDate > :date))), secondPersonName.firstName, secondPersonName.lastName, substring(secondPersonName.middleName, 0, 1), (select targetOffender.offenderNumber from omis.offender.domain.Offender targetOffender where targetOffender.id = secondPerson.id), firstPersonName.firstName, firstPersonName.lastName, substring(firstPersonName.middleName, 0, 1), (select subjectOffender.offenderNumber from omis.offender.domain.Offender subjectOffender where subjectOffender.id = firstPerson.id), separationNeed.date, separationNeed.removal.date, case when separationNeed.removal.date is null and ((cast(legacy_find_ofndr_cor_status((select firstOffender.offenderNumber from omis.offender.domain.Offender firstOffender where firstOffender = firstPerson)) as string) = 'SEC') and (cast(legacy_find_ofndr_cor_status((select secondOffender.offenderNumber from omis.offender.domain.Offender secondOffender where secondOffender = secondPerson)) as string) = 'SEC')) then true else false end, separationNeed.creationComment) from omis.separationneed.domain.SeparationNeed separationNeed left join separationNeed.relationship relationship left join relationship.firstPerson firstPerson left join firstPerson.name firstPersonName left join relationship.secondPerson secondPerson left join secondPerson.name secondPersonName where firstPerson = :offender or secondPerson = :offender order by separationNeed.date
